description.brief: Collection of tools for plan-based robot control

package.description: This repository contains a collection of tools for plan-based robot control. Currently this contains a gazebo world of our floor in the ICO building in Osnabr√ºck, a map of our floor in the ICO building and rviz-markers for visualizing grasps.
package.author: Nils Niemann/nils.niemann@dfki.de, Sebastian Stock/sebatian.stock@dfki.de
